attributes.action: Amend Our EU membership to restrict workers from other member states. Nearly 1 Million Young people in the UK unemployed!
attributes.additional_details: We have nearly one million of our young people unemployed, we are in danger of a lost generation of skills, youth unemployment has been rising year on year since 2004 (the boom years) , that is one year after the new EU states joined and we are flooded with a cheap workforce ( 1 million, funny that ) leaving our young people on the scrap heap. Act now before it is too late!
